reviewText: BEWARE BARGAIN HUNTERS . . . somebody else reported how bad this product is - - - but I couldn't imagine anything quite that negative.  Wrong!  All six of these flicks are worse quality than something you might have "taped" on the first VCRs ever to come out.  I have the feeling that the AMC (on the label) must mean AWFUL MEDIA CONTENT.  It takes a lot to make Vivien Leigh and Elizabeth Taylor look terrible, but whoever produced this junk did it. Do NOT Buy.
